name: Szylagyi Law, LLC
description: The professional website for Szilagyi Law, LLC.
dependencies: Custom HTML and CSS via Squarespace

name: Goal-Getter
description: Goal-Getter is a social-goal-sharing app designed to connect individuals with similar goals.

name: Breaking Bread
description: Breaking Bread is an app designed to connect organizations or individuals that deal with hunger with restaurants, food banks, or individuals who has the means to meet those hunger-related needs.
dependencies: Express, MySQL, Sequelize, Handlebars, Passport, Bootstrap

name: Covid Activities
description: Covid Activities is an app that my group and I developed to alleviate bored during the quarantine. In our version, users are able to search for either food recipes based on specific ingredients or culinary preferences, or they can search for books based on author or genre.
dependencies: HTML, Bulma CSS framework, JavaScript, jQuery, Pixlr

name: Personal Profile
description: My first professional portfolio displays general information about me, contact information, a portfolio page, and links to my social media presences.

name: Burger Smash: Burger Consumption Tracker and Planner
description: Burger Smash was completed as a homework assignment in the University of Pennsylvania's/Trilogy Educational Service's full-stack computer coding bootcamp. It is a front- and back-end application that is able to allow users to enter new burgers to eat, delete those already consumed, and keep a list of the same.
dependencies: Express (Node), MySQL, ORM/Controller, Javascript, CSS, HTML

name: Express Note-Taker
description: The Express Note-Taker was completed as a homework assignment. The app allows users to create notes that persist until they are deleted.
dependencies: HTML, Bootstrap CSS framework, JavaScript, jQuery, Nodejs NPM packages: Express, FS, Nodemon

name: Weather Outlook
description: The Weather App makes API calls according to the town a user would like outlook information for.
dependencies: HTML, Bootstrap CSS framework, Javascript, jQuery (AJAX calls)
